name: Maelstrom Prototype
description:
THING TAKES A BIT TO LOAD WHEN YOU CLICK RUN GAME.

This is a prototype game made in under two weeks to test a  iteration on a retro arcade game mechanic ( That game being Tempest).  Built using Phaser framework and HTML 5. Students attending MEAE program at The  University of Utah.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrows - Move

Spacebar - Dash and kill enemies in your lane and the opposing lane

Credits:

Kaltin Kirby - Producer

Cameron Brotzman - Art
